alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; Los Angeles County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 21 at 1:37PM PDT until October 23 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SATURDAY TO 3 AM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Mountains and Antelope Valley. * WHEN...From 11 AM Saturday to 3 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds and reduced visibility from blowing dust will make driving difficult. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Antelope Valley; Los Angeles County Mountains
